name: National Genomics Data Center (NGDC), China National Center for Bioinformation (CNCB)
description: Provides a family of database resources to support the global academic and industrial communities through big data archiving, integrative analysis and value-added curation. NGDC focuses on multi-omics data, biodiversity, disease/trait associations, and maintains interoperability with international databases and initiatives.
owner_name: China National Center for Bioinformation (CNCB), National Genomics Data Center (NGDC)
